description: This schema represents a person's heart rate variability, which measures the variation in time intervals between consecutive heartbeats.

references.description: The SNOMED code represents Heart rate variability (observable entity)

heart_rate_variability.description: The measured heart rate variability value with its unit.

algorithm.description: The algorithm used to calculate the heart rate variability.

algorithm_details.description: Additional details about the algorithm used to calculate heart rate variability.

measurement_method.description: The method used to measure the heart rate from which variability was calculated.

effective_time_frame.description: The time frame to which the heart rate variability measurement applies.

descriptive_statistic.description: The descriptive statistic applied to heart rate variability measurements.

temporal_relationship_to_physical_activi.description: The relationship of the measurement to physical activity.

temporal_relationship_to_sleep.description: The relationship of the measurement to sleep.
